summary: Provides comprehensive unit and integration tests for a video‑to‑video stable diffusion pipeline, covering dummy component initialization, input validation, output consistency, batch handling, image count per prompt, model saving/loading, default generation behavior, attention module execution, and two‑step generation verification.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the video‑to‑video generation pipeline through automated testing, enabling reliable deployment and maintenance of the diffusion model service.
